value.title: Photo storage app maker settles FTC claims over use of facial recognition

value.title: Masks no obstacle for new NEC facial recognition system
value.excerpt: Japan's NEC Corp has launched a facial recognition system that identifies people even when they are wearing masks, adapting to a new normal where face coverings have become a key form of protection against the spread of the coronavirus.

value.title: Intel's new RealSense ID packs on-device facial recognition

value.title: Intel is using its RealSense tech for facial recognition
value.excerpt: Intel has found another use for its RealSense depth-sensing camera. It married the tech with a neural network to develop a facial recognition system that can enable access to the likes of smart locks and ATMs with only a glance.

value.title: Facial recognition: Now algorithms can see through face masks

value.title: The best facial recognition security cameras of 2021
value.excerpt: Some home security cameras have facial recognition, an advanced option that lets you make a database of people who regularly come to your house. Then, when the camera sees a face, it determines whether or not it belongs to someone in your list of known faces.
